buildings.name: Forge
buildings.description: Smelt ores into bars and craft metal equipment. Smiths create weapons and armor.

tiers.flavorText: Strengthens defenses when health is critical.
Refined weapon procs deal more damage.
Armor blocks flat damage from each hit.
Refined plates block more damage from each hit.
Immaculate plates offer superior blocking on each hit.
Transcendent plates block tremendous damage from each hit.
